description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below.  The delivery is requested at CFB Esquimalt & CFB Halifax.
full_summary:
================

### Tender Notice - F25LMHC(OBM) and Tiller Handle/Installation Kit

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal

**Reference Number:** cb-4930-19742117

**Publication Date:** April 21, 2023

**Tender Closing Date and Time:** May 8, 2023, 14:00:00

### Background

The Department of National Defense is soliciting proposals for the procurement of several items, including a multifunction tiller handle, installation kits, and outboard motors. The delivery is requested at two Canadian Forces Bases (CFB) in British Columbia (Esquimalt) and Nova Scotia (Halifax).

### Required Items

The following items are required:

* Item 1: GSIN 2805, Fitting Kit, Multifunction Tiller Handle (Part Number: 6X4-42102-J3-00, NCAGE: S4544 YAMAHA MOTOR CO. LTD MARINE ENGINE DIVISION) - 10 pieces to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt
* Item 2: GSIN 2805, Fitting Kit, Multifunction Tiller Handle (Part Number: 6X4-42102-J3-00, NCAGE: S4544 YAMAHA MOTOR CO. LTD MARINE ENGINE DIVISION) - 10 pieces to be delivered to CFB Halifax
* Item 3: GSIN 2805, Multifunction Tiller Handle Fitting Kit (Part Number: 6X4-42103-5C-00, NCAGE: S4544 YAMAHA MOTOR CO. LTD MARINE ENGINE DIVISION) - 10 pieces to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt
* Item 4: GSIN 2805, Multifunction Tiller Handle Fitting Kit (Part Number: 6X4-42103-5C-00, NCAGE: S4544 YAMAHA MOTOR CO. LTD MARINE ENGINE DIVISION) - 10 pieces to be delivered to CFB Halifax
* Item 5: GSIN 2805, Outboard Motor, Gasoline (Part Number: F25LMHC, NCAGE: S4544 YAMAHA MOTOR CO. LTD MARINE ENGINE DIVISION) - 10 pieces to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt
* Item 6: GSIN 2805, Outboard Motor, Gasoline (Part Number: F
